item.description:
This is a a second new group just for folks who want the basics of Chen Style Tai Chi. (That way you have choices!) We will work on foundational principles and apply them in the 18 Essentials form. At his last visit, Grandmaster Chen gave us excellent details about this wonderful form which will inform our work together. If you have never studied Chen Style or if you would like to refresh or deepen your knowledge of the basics, this is the group for you.
This group will meet every week until Christmas.
item.how_to_find_us: As you face Wadsworth village, take the driveway on the far right. Go halfway down to second building on the left: Putnam Barn. Go in stairs that are closest to the road. Three steps up and six steps down. Look for sign: The Spiral Path
item.name: Foundations of Chen Tai Chi: 18 Essentials
